nodes.title: Registration of columns for generated keys is now dialect dependent.
Add r2dbc-postgresql Interval to simple types
Support pageable query by example. Add overload method findAll with Pageable
Remove .RELEASE suffix from version number in documentation
GH-494 - Fix links to Spring-Framework reference.
gh-492 - Add HStore support on Postgres dialect
Fix lack of @Modifying in example code
#421 - Handle modifying query methods returning kotlin.Unit.
Refactor Spring Data R2DBC on top of Spring R2DBC
Insert should work without giving any explicit assignment/variables
#373 - Use SpelQueryContext for expression query parsing
Allow saving an entity with a read-only collection-like property.
#344 Add support for support distinct derived query methods
#341 Add support for modifying derived query methods
Add note about auditing being unsupported
Move off deprecated Criteria and Update
Move off deprecated Criteria and Update
Move off deprecated Criteria and Update
Move off deprecated Criteria and Update
#93 - Adding support for optimistic locking based on @Version column
Readme: correct parent interface PersonRepository example
Add tests for create and drop statements.
Guard Repository.save(…) with provided Id with TransientDataAccessException if row does not exist
Use consistently spaces instead of tabs in readme code samples
#209 - Provide extensions on TypedExecuteSpec and GenericExecuteSpec.
Editing pass for the reference docs
#105 - Move named parameter resolution to ReactiveDataAccessStrategy
Fix scheme name in sample code
Provide extension mechanism for R2dbcDialect resolution
Reuse Dialect support provided by Spring Data Relational
Accept SQL directly in DatabaseClient.execute(…) stage.
#107 - Add ConnectionFactoryTransactionManager and reactive transaction management utilities
Add fluent update() and delete() operations to DatabaseClient and improve select() and insert().
#57 - Add support for R2DBC subclass exception translation.
Use customized ConnectionFactory lookup to avoid AbstractR2dbcConfiguration proxying
Emit inserted object through SimpleR2dbcRepository.save(…) with given Id
Add non-nullable variant to RowsFetchSpec extensions
#75 - Add support for MySQL using jasync-mysql
#56 - Use Statement Builder API for SELECT statements
Add converters for simple type projections
#8 - Replace exchange() operator with map(…) and then() operators.
#30 - Add custom conversion support to write array-typed values.
Repro intermittent order change in saveAll
